sentences.en: Building facades pulsate with millions of lights and glowing neon display.
sentences.cn: 在千万灯光和霓虹灯的照耀下,建筑物的外墙规律地闪动着.

sentences.en: Hues of purplish, rose and amber begin to pulsate in the sky.
sentences.cn: 淡紫色的 、 玫瑰色的和琥珀色的色调开始在天空中微微颤动起来.

sentences.en: I could see the veins in his neck pulsating.
sentences.cn: 我看到他颈部的血管在跳动。

sentences.en: I felt my heart pulsate with the aftershock.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到自己的心和余震在一起震动!

sentences.en: Pulsate us have fob price for Ms. Plate.
The air seemed to pulsate with the bright light.
sentences.cn: 空气似乎随着亮光而颤动.

sentences.en: We could see the blood vessels in his temple pulsate as he became more angry.
sentences.cn: 我们可以看到血管搏动他的庙宇,他变得更加愤怒.

sentences.en: When ABS is activated, the driver feels the brake pedal pulsate gently.
sentences.cn: 当激活abs系统时, 驾驶员踩制动踏板有轻微的脉动的感觉.

words.tran_cn: 脉冲的；跳动的；脉冲调制的
颤动；有规律地跳动（pulsate的现在分词）
使跳动；使摆动（pulse的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 搏动, 跳动, 有规律的跳动
trans.tran_en: to make sounds or movements that are strong and regular like a heart beating

trans.tran_cn: 搏动，悸动，有规律地跳动
